questiontext.text:
1      #include <iostream>
2      #include <fstream>
3      int main() {
4          FILE *in;
5          int count = 0;
6          float buffer;
7          if ((in = fopen("files\\in.txt", "r")) != NULL) {
8              while (!feof(in)) {
9                  fscanf(in,"%f",&buffer);
10                  if (buffer > 0) count++;
11              }
12              printf("Number of positive numbers: %d\n", count);
13          }
14          else puts("File empty\n");
15          return 0;
16      }


При компиляции программы результат будет: 2

1      #include <iostream>
2      int func(int a, int b) {{
3          int c = 32;
4          int result = a - c * b;
5          return result;
6      }
7      int main() {
8          int a = 31;
9          int b = -43;
10          std::cout << "result: " << func(a,b) << "\n";
11          return 0;
12      }

1      #include <iostream>
2      void func(int a, int b, int c) {
3          int result = 0;
4          while (result < b) {
5      	result += a;
6          }
7          std::cout << "result: " << result << "\n";
8      }
9      int main() {
10          int a = 38;
11          int b = 1;
12          int c = a + b;
13          func(a,b,c);
14          return 0;
15      }

2      void func(float a, float b, float c) {
3          float result = 0;
4          while (result < b) {
5      	result += a;
6          
7          std::cout << "result: " << result << "\n";
8      }

Сопоставьте ошибки со строчками кода:

1      #include <iostream>
2      #include <cmath>
3      int main() {
4          double a = -2;
5          double b = 53;
6          double c = 75;
7          double x1, x2;
8          if ((b*b - 4*a*c) >= 0) {
9              x1 = (-1*b + sqrt(b*b - 4*a*c)) / (2 * a);
10              std::cout << "x1: " << x1 << "\n";
11              x2 = (-1*b - sqrt(b*b - 4*a*c)) / (2 * a);
12              std::cout << "x2: " << x2 << "\n";
13          }
14          else {
15              std::cout << "The discriminant is less than 0" << "\n";
16          }
17          return 0;
18      }
